amendment.description: An amendment numbered 77 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of the Deputy Under Secretary of the Food and Nutrition Service of the Department of Agriculture, Stacy Dean, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
